content: the budding acorns dishcloth is a quick and cosy crochet project that s perfect for autumn featuring a beautiful textured stitch pattern inspired by tiny acorn buds this dishcloth adds a handmade touch to your kitchen or makes a thoughtful gift this easy pattern works up quickly and is great for using up leftover cotton yarn it s suitable for confident beginners and includes a full step-by-step video tutorial to help you along the way crochet a single dishcloth for your home or make a matching set for gifts or craft fairs either way it s a practical and relaxing project you ll love making again and again **pattern includes ** * written instructions in us crochet terms * full video tutorial * free printable belly bands * links to featured belly bands 1 * yarn hook and finishing details **skill level** easy **yarn** aran weight cotton **hook** 5mm 1 https //lullabylodge etsy com/listing/4382649855
